message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we can both enjoy our share.
Let's be practical, Alice. I'm proposing a 70/30 split.  Time is money, and every round costs us. This is a fair offer considering the time value.
The clock is ticking, Bob.  I'm being more than fair, but I won't wait forever. This is my final offer.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you a 45% share, which is very generous considering the time pressure. Take it before inflation eats further into my share!
